abilities.name: Powerslide
abilities.description: Slide to a location dealing 91 damage and stunning enemies hit for 1.25 second.

abilities.name: Face Melt
abilities.description: Deals 68 damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back.

abilities.name: Guitar Solo
abilities.description: Regenerate 66 Health per second for 4 seconds.

heroics.name: Mosh Pit
heroics.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

heroics.name: Stage Dive
heroics.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.
